test.name: Test Plus Text

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element '//a[contains(text(),'QNU HƯỚNG TỚI THƯ VIỆN HIỆN ĐẠI VỚI GIẢI PHÁP BẢO ')]'.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.msg: ${text_can_click} = ///span[contains(text(),'Từ ngày 05-10/9/2025, Trường Đại học Quy Nhơn phối')]
kw.arg: ///span[contains(text(),'Từ ngày 05-10/9/2025, Trường Đại học Quy Nhơn phối')]
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Get Style
kw.doc: Gets the computed style properties of the element selected by ``selector``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Get Style
kw.doc: Gets the computed style properties of the element selected by ``selector``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Convert To Number
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a floating point number.

kw.name: Convert To Number
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a floating point number.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: THÀNH CÔNG: Cỡ chữ tăng từ ${so_cu}px lên ${so_moi}px
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: THẤT BẠI: Cỡ chữ không tăng (${so_cu}px → ${so_moi}px)
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
